thread.section_title: Brian Gavin Diamonds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brian Gavin Diamonds | briangavindiamonds.com
thread.title: Courtney M.
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by Courtney M.

author: Courtney M.
title: Courtney M.
text: I recently purchased a pair of milgrain bezel stud earrings, and I couldn't be happier. The diamonds are lively and bright, and the settings are delicate and beautiful. Jamie assisted me in making the purchase, and the customer service I received was top notch. I will absolutely work with Brian Gavin again for future purchases!
